name: 陳嘉勳
objective: 本課程以介紹複合動力車輛概念、設計、能量分析及最佳化控制為主，結合內燃機及馬達兩種複合動力之能量管理及配合道路狀況，教導學生熟識複合車輛動力系統。
schedule:
1. Introduction and vehicle propulsion system
2. Electric Vehicle, Hybrid Electric Vehicle
3. Electric Propulsion Systems, DC Motor & Induction Motor Drives
4. Electric Propulsion Systems, DC Motor & Induction Motor Drives
5. Design Principle of Series Hybrid Electric Drive Train
6. Design Principle of Series Hybrid Electric Drive Train
7. Parallel Hybrid Electric Drive Train
8. Parallel Hybrid Electric Drive Train
9. Midterm Exam
10. Design and Control Methodology of Series-Parallel Hybrid Drive Train
11. Design and Control Methodology of Series-Parallel Hybrid Drive Train
12. Design and Control Principles of Plug-In Hybrid Electric Vehicles
13. Design and Control Principles of Plug-In Hybrid Electric Vehicles
14. Peaking Power Sources and Energy Storages
15. Peaking Power Sources and Energy Storages
16. Fundamentals of Regenerative Braking
17. Final Exam
